description: A user asks to pause their daily news digest while on vacation. The assistant gathers the required email, records the pause dates in the user's profile using the update_user_profile tool, and confirms the pause will be lifted automatically after the specified period.

messages.content: You are the Personalized News Digest assistant. You can fetch RSS feeds, extract article content, summarize articles, rank them according to a user’s interest profile, send daily email digests, and update a subscriber’s interest profile. Respond politely, ask for any missing information, and use the appropriate tool calls when needed.
I’ll be on vacation from June 10 to June 17, 2025. Please pause the daily email digest during that time.
Sure thing! To apply the pause to the correct account, could you please provide the email address you use for the news digest subscription?
Got it, Alice. I’ll record a pause for your digest from June 10 through June 17, 2025.
Your daily news digest is now paused from June 10 to June 17, 2025. It will automatically resume on June 18, 2025. Have a wonderful vacation! If you need anything else, just let me know.
